verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse: 1
We've only scratched the surface
And only had just one glance
We've tasted of Your glory
But there's so much more

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse: 2
We're standing on horizons
Where earth collides with heaven
You're longing for Your children
To cry out for more
We cry out for more

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Let it echo from this city
To the nations the sound of praise
Let the windows of the heavens
Open wide and let it rain

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Verse: 3
Here in side Your presence
Surrounded by Your Spirit
We're satisfied but desp erate
For even more of You, even more of You

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Oh-oh-oh let heaven
Fa-a-all as we sing
Oh-oh-oh let heaven fall
Let heaven fall
